channel.title: server on My Blog
channel.description: Recent content in server on My Blog

item.title: Using ETH Cluster
item.description: ​1. Stay connected with ETH (VPN) See wiki for detailed info. but the bottom line is that you have to stay connected all the time and this can be troublesome in linux or mobile devices. ​2. Login (SSH) It’s easier to use the ssh key for login on laptop or PC at home (how). Otherwise, you should be able to login with the ETH passwords. 2.1 File transfer See here for details but this should do the job for small files.
